tool.name: mtbls520_07_species_diversity
tool.description: Generate matrix of various species diversity indices from the MTBLS520 study.
tool.help: This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes. ---- Module: Species diversity Description: Generate matrix of various species diversity indices from the MTBLS520 study. Input parameters: - Input Preprocess Rdata file Output parameters: - Species diversity matrix - Final Rdata file: Please connect this Rdata file to the subsequent modules of the MTBLS520 workflow. ---- For updates and documentation, please visit: https://github.com/korseby/container-mtbls520
